text: Benny Napoleon (1955 â€“ December 17, 2020) was an American attorney, law enforcement officer, and Democratic politician. He was the Sheriff of Wayne County, Michigan. He was also a 2013 candidate for Mayor of Detroit. From 2009 until his death, Wayne County Sheriff. Napolean was born in Detroit. Napoleon was diagnosed with COVID-19 in November 2020. He died on December 17, 2020 in Detroit from the infection, aged 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Detroit Category:American police officers Category:African-American lawyers Category:African-American politicians Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Detroit
title: Benny Napoleon
